data.actual_result: The user will stay on the list and Discord will show a "Send" button (which doesn't work).
data.expected_result: The button should switch to "Accepted" or remove the user from the list.
data.short_description: After accepting an user from the new "Add Friend" Discord will show a "Send" button
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you have the new Add Friends feature (it should look like this:  ). - From "Add Friend" (not from "Pending") accept a Friend Request or ask to a friend to send you a friend request and accept it. - Once you have accepted the Friend Request you can notice that the button from "Accept" has switched to "Send" instead of "Accepted" or vanished.
